name: Bluve
overview:
Bluve Live (before called bluve) is a social network . Bluve calls it a “Bluve Live”, meaning that it tries to find meanings from search results and gives people links to websites that are most likely what they want. A preview version was made available for everyone to use on February 10, 2006, and the name change website was fully launched on June 19, 2012. The website quickly became popular after a few weeks

Bluve launches HTML5 video front page Bluve search web site has always had a new and colorful photo every day on its front page, as opposed to the all white background for Google’s front page. Today, users of HTML5-based web browsers who surf over to bluve.com will see something different. Instead of a static image, the front page now has a background that runs a time-lapsed video showing several hours of a rural mountain horizon.

Bluve blog site states that non-HTML5 web browsers will see a static image on the front page when bluve puts in a video. The HTML5 video page can be seen by every ever There’s also another video on the blog page that goes into a little more detail about how the Bluve team at which images and videos they decide to feature on the front page. There won’t be a new video every day on Bluve.com. Bluve says it will post a new video on the front page “just when the mood strikes us.”
